definition: to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross

sentences.english: You have to wear special clothing, just in case your raft gets turned upside down or sinks.
sentences.chinese: 你得身着特製的服裝以防橡皮筏傾翻或者沉入水中。

sentences.english: One fishing boat capsized after the jellyfish became entangled in its nets.
sentences.chinese: 有一艘漁船被這種水母纏住漁網之後，傾翻了。

sentences.english: The ship has been heaved down at the beach, but not yet repaired.
sentences.chinese: 那條船已傾翻在海濱上，可還沒修理呢。
